programme.title: Petani Milenial Cintanya Kearifan Lokal
programme.desc: Siapa kata petani mesti orang tua? Malah golongan yang berjiwa juga bersemangat untuk menjadi petani, dan Dadang adalah salah seorang daripada mereka. Tambahan pula, dia menjadi lebih bersemangat selepas kedatangan Kia, seorang doktor cantik di kampungnya. Ternyata Kia mempunyai misi khas. Apa agaknya?

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep40
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Pop Academy Ep51
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: Cinta Misteri Ep24
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep26
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep76
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Kesabaran Anak Yatim Hingga Sukses Menjadi Sarjana
programme.desc: Adik beradik kembar, Rena dan Reni, sangat berbakti kepada bapa mereka. Mereka sanggup mengambil alih pekerjaan ayah mereka untuk menyara hidup semasa bersekolah memandangkan ayah mereka sedang sakit.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep65
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Jejak Misteri Ep8
programme.desc: Jejak Misteri ialah sebuah rancangan realiti bergenre misteri di mana setiap episod menyajikan liputan pelbagai tempat, bangunan dan tapak bersejarah yang bukan sahaja menyimpan kisah-kisah bersejarah, malah turut meninggalkan kisah-kisah mistik.

programme.title: Di Sebelah Ada Surga Ep8
programme.desc: Di Sebelah Ada Surga menceritakan tentang 3 pemuda iaitu Andika, Gading, dan Uus. Kehidupan rohaniah mereka dikatakan masih kurang. Masa muda mereka telah diisikan dengan santai tanpa mempedulikan masa depan. Mereka sibuk mengejar keseronokan duniawi yang tipikal dari golongan belia hari ini.

programme.title: Kesabaran Anak Yatim Hingga Sukses Menjadi Sarjana
programme.desc: Adik beradik kembar, Rena dan Reni, sangat berbakti kepada bapa mereka. Mereka sanggup mengambil alih pekerjaan ayah mereka untuk menyara hidup semasa bersekolah memandangkan ayah mereka sedang sakit.

programme.title: Keluarga Suamiku Menjadi Parasit Dalam Rumah Tanggaku
programme.desc: Perkahwinan adalah masa untuk membina keluarga. Namun, perkara ini tidak berlaku kepada Nola dan Fahmi. Ibu Desi, ibu kepada Nola, tidak merestui perkahwinan mereka kerana Fahmi dianggap miskin.

programme.title: Untuk Apa Aku Dinikahi, Kalau Hanya Disakiti?
programme.desc: Nana akan bersalin tidak lama lagi. Semasa dalam perjalanan ditemani suaminya, mereka mengalami kemalangan. Malangnya, suaminya meninggal dunia.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep76
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Pop Academy Ep15
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: The Sultan Ep27
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep57
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep77
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Jelaskan Cintamu Padaku Seyuyur-Yuyurnya
programme.desc: Mengikut warisan nenek Henri, Henri perlu berkahwin dengan Ina, seorang pemandu bas yang disukai nenek. Henri dan Ina terpaksa memalsukan perkahwinan mereka untuk kepentingan mereka.

programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. programme.title: The Pirates
programme.desc: Before the founding of the Joseon Dynasty, envoys from China lose the Royal Seal to a whale. A group of bandits attempt to retrieve it for a large reward and run into a group of pirates.

programme.title: The Negotiation
programme.desc: An arms dealer kidnapped two Koreans in Bangkok where the hostages were in fact held in an abandoned children's home in South Korea, when the kidnapper's motivations becomes clearer.

programme.title: Memoir Of A Murderer
programme.desc: A retired serial killer with Alzheimer's disease who killed those who have committed sins "equally worse" fights to protect his daughter from her psychotic boyfriend.

programme.title: Architecture 101
programme.desc: An architect gets an unexpected visit by his first love whom he hasn't seen in many years, bringing back memories from when they first met 15 years ago.

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: Ji Min witnesses a hit-and-run and starts confusing reality and fantasy. She becomes a suspect of the hit-and-run along with Woo Ri, with a policeman chasing their every move named In Tae.

programme.title: Luck-Key
programme.desc: A case of stolen identity leads to hilarious events when a struggling actor and a hit man for hire swaps lives.

programme.title: Big Match
programme.desc: A man framed for murder battles a game planner who is intent on turning a city into one giant game board that he can control.

programme.title: Feng Shui
programme.desc: A fengshui expert, Park Jae-Sang, who can determine the land that bring good fortune and people around him compete to occupy the land in order to change their fate and become king.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 1. The Subversion
programme.desc: A young girl escaped from a government facility and lost all her memory. Years later, when she appears on a nationally televised show, mysterious faces from her past life reappear.

programme.title: Voice Of Silence
programme.desc: Two guys make a living by cleaning up crime scenes were asked to take care of a kidnapped girl by their superior. As their superior were killed, the duo are clueless on what to do with the girl...

programme.title: In Our Prime
programme.desc: Genius Mathematician defected from the North tried to hide his past eventually started teaching a student who gave up on Maths the right way to find the answer.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve at an ultra-luxurious building complex, a White Christmas party is held to dazzle its equally high-end tenants and VIP guests. It takes a horrific turn when a fire breaks out.

programme.title: Beautiful Vampire
programme.desc: A beautiful 500-year-old vampire has her carefully constructed quiet life put in jeopardy when she becomes attracted to her landlady's doltish son.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the China–North Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: Hwayi: A Monster Boy
programme.desc: A boy raised by five fathers attached to the criminal world is about to discover the sinister truth about his past when he is forced to pull the trigger when he tags along with his fathers on a job.

programme.title: The Tenor - Lirico Spinto
programme.desc: A strong partnership and friendship begins when a talented Korean vocalist met a Japanese music producer. At the peak of his career, he was diagnosed with thyroid cancer and might loss his voice...

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: The Thieves
programme.desc: Korean and Hong Kong thieves team up to heist a $20M worth diamond, while everyone has their own agenda to keep the diamond for themselves.

programme.title: Memoir Of A Murderer
programme.desc: A retired serial killer with Alzheimer's disease who killed those who have committed sins "equally worse" fights to protect his daughter from her psychotic boyfriend.

programme.title: The Pirates
programme.desc: Before the founding of the Joseon Dynasty, envoys from China lose the Royal Seal to a whale. A group of bandits attempt to retrieve it for a large reward and run into a group of pirates.

programme.title: Hot Blooded
programme.desc: A small and quiet port in Busan outskirt became the battlefield of local gangsters.

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: When a high school gym teacher helps his student track down her missing friend, he finds himself faced with a conspiracy related to her disappearance.

programme.title: Take Off
programme.desc: Rounding up five inexperienced athletes from a small Korean town with nothing to lose, they form the first Korean ski jump team in hope of winning gold.

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: Ji Min witnesses a hit-and-run and starts confusing reality and fantasy. She becomes a suspect of the hit-and-run along with Woo Ri, with a policeman chasing their every move named In Tae.

programme.title: Architecture 101
programme.desc: An architect gets an unexpected visit by his first love whom he hasn't seen in many years, bringing back memories from when they first met 15 years ago.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep897898
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep29062907
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1983
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3537
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1008
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep36
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep173174
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep430
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Back To Home (M) Ep2829
programme.desc: When the news reached her that the old village leader had passed away, Xiao Li, who was a personal shopper, stuffed a few things into her Hermes bag and, clutching the lucky salt he had once given her, set out for her home town wearing her Prada high-heeled shoes. That night A-Jian, who was helping out in a Japanese restaurant, also jumped on the bus and headed home as soon as he received the news. In his will, the old man divided up his salt fields among the villagers, but on the condition that A-Jian and Xiao Li get married. When they heard this, A-Jian and Xiao Li found themselves immediately surrounded…

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: Andy Lau is a monk turned body-builder, with the gift of foreseeing people's lives. He befriends a female cop (Cecilia Cheung) and uses his gift to change the force of Karma and her destiny. The movie is ultimately a Buddhist parable about the nature of karma.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Daily’s Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi’s actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect’s Zhang Chui Shan’s son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team’s performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan’s help.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughter’s diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Wolf Warrior II
programme.desc: In this action-packed sequel to the 2015 blockbuster hit, China’s deadliest Special Forces operative, Leng Feng (Wu Jing), returns into action when he crosses paths with a sadistic band of mercenaries terrorizing innocent civilians.

programme.title: Chungking Express
programme.desc: Two Hong Kong urban love stories depicting two Hong Kong policemen, both jilted by ex-lovers and falling in love again. One falls for a mysterious female underworld figure while the other is in love with a beautiful and witty server at a fast food restaurant he frequents.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: During Tang Dynasty, two police deputies are tasked to catch the new leader of a revolutionary faction known as the House of Flying Daggers. They capture a blind dancer suspected of being the daughter of the ex-leader but both fall in love with her. When passion turns into hatred and loyalty turns into betrayal, love will be the deadliest weapon!

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Police’s Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: Yuddy is an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to Philippines to meet with his mother, but the trip ended up disheartening him again.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xing’s son attempts drug trafficking to save his father’s studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderella’s adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: Former SWAT captain Dong Gu suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Wine War
programme.desc: A Chinese wine expert residing in France is contacted by his childhood buddy in China to help him bid for a famous bottle of vintage wine in an auction. Little did he realize he is about to enter an age-old feud between rivaling vineyards and discover a historical mystery that might shatter the whole wine industry.

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the “Gang of Five” in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fiancé left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle…

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves “The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real “Chosen Sleuth” instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers’ claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewelry heist by his former boss, who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when he discovers his first love works at the store.

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huang’s father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70’s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister’s magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Flag Of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes. You have the good guys from the righteous clan versus the bad guys from the villainous clan and it's so filled with "don't-blink-or-you-will-miss-something" gags, you will need to watch it over and over again so you can see the things you missed.

programme.title: Na Cha The Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend “Investiture of the Gods”, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: Purple Darts
programme.desc: A girl vows to take revenge for her parents who were murdered by four outlaws when she was only a baby. To do so, she trains hard at martial arts and teams up with a swordsman and a couple to finally kill them all.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiancée Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: Village Of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: Journey Of The Doomed
programme.desc: Journey Of The Doomed stars Tung Wei as a knight that finds himself protecting the life of a beautiful young lady, the lost Emperor's daughter and stalked by a bunch of assassins headed by kung fu actress extraordinaire Hui Ying-Hung.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: The Qing government assigns fighters to destroy Shaolin Temple and kill all the disciples, but two of them successfully escaped. They train under different masters and learn the Wing Chun and Hung Quan styles respectively, finally killing the fighters and taking revenge for the death of their fellow disciples.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Young Vagabond
programme.desc: It's a fact: the greatest martial arts movie character is Huang Fei-hung. But it's quite possible the second greatest character is "Beggar Su", one of the famous Ten Kwangtung Tigers, and a legendary Ching Dynasty figure. Little known director Liu Shih-yu decided to fill his telling of the character's life story with the best kung-fu actors Shaw Studios had to offer. He reunited the stars of Liu Chia-liang's landmark Dirty Ho -- Gordon Liu Chia-hui, Wang Yu, and Wang Lung-wei--added such other greats as multi-award-winning Ku Feng and Pai Piao, then gave workhorse Lo Chiang his shot as choreographer. Together they made a rare, colorful, action-packed adventure as Beggar Su and his brother train incessantly to defeat the brutally powerful thief called Centipede. Finally, after much death and destruction, Gordon Liu Chia-hui and Wang Lung-wei get a memorable rematch to follow their classic masterpieces in Dirty Ho and Martial Club. The result is not only reminiscent of preeminent director Liu Chia-liang's work, but essentially an homage to him as well!

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: Lion Vs Lion
programme.desc: The traditional lion dance has never looked so good as in Lion VS Lion which captures the most impressive sequences of lion dancing on film. Besides being loaded with enjoyable martial arts chicanery, film historians can revel because it's also the first film that clearly demonstrates the intricacies and differences between the traditional Northern and Southern lion dancing techniques. The Five Venom alumnus and Chang Cheh discovery, Lo Meng, teams up with Liu Chia-liang protege Wang Yu, as they inadvertently turn from vagabond kung-fu school operators into anti-Ching, patriotic fighters.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, however, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf for winning the lantern contest. At the same time, Zhao plans for revenge. One day, after Long’s wife suddenly disappeared, Long hears about the story of human lantern, leading him to suspect Zhao may involve in the incident…

programme.title: Gang Master
programme.desc: This is a story about an army out to destroy the Hsien Lung gang of anti-Yuan revolutionaries. Their leader Ru Yi Tu is up against Fu Zhong Yuan, the identified successor of the Hsien Lung gang who must also prove his own legitimacy. The plot thickens with murder, sibling rivalry and shocking discoveries that could change the course of history.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple’s brothel.

programme.title: The Young Avenger
programme.desc: Liu seeks out Li to avenge his brother’s death and loses an arm in the fight, vowing revenge ten years later. Li dies after asking his sister to send his daughter Bao Zhu to learn the Dragon Sword skill to avenge his death. Bao Zhu grows up to become a skilled swordswoman and meets Liu for the planned duel with her cousin Chen. Can she defeat Liu?

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sing’s wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: Asia-Pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho is perfectly cast as a gun-for-hire who always gets her man - in more ways than one! The cast and crew shot on location in Japanese scenic spots such as Mount Fuji; and there are plenty of over-the-top thrills, as Lily even masquerades as a nun.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband’s playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Men From The Gutter
programme.desc: Two very different cops are out to capture a local drug boss. In this sizzling crime thriller, the two cops go about doing their jobs differently - one does everything to the letter of the law and the other just doing whatever it takes to solve crime.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professor’s assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: Clans Of Intrigue
programme.desc: One day, when the heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, Gong from the Holy Water Palace accuses Chu of stealing the holy water and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove him innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case…

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin’s daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Long Road To Gallantry
programme.desc: Tu Meng Fei makes his way to the world after completing his kung fu training. En route, he rescues Mu Wan Erh and Li San Nan from a band of thugs and later learnt of a 20-year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Mu’s lost father is none other than the Thunder Gang Chief, who also killed Li’s father…

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: Asura Guru
programme.desc: The life of a high-tech robber with exceptional skills of evading the law changes when a private detective tries to get a hold of him.

programme.title: Arasangam
programme.desc: Arivarasu goes to Canada to search for his missing brother-in-law. However, he discovers a plot by terrorists to kill all intellectuals in India and stop the country's growth.

programme.title: Bangalore Naatkal
programme.desc: Three cousins, Arjun, Divya and Kannan, relocate to Bangalore for various reasons. However, they face many challenges which change their lives forever.

programme.title: Thirunaal
programme.desc: Blade, a henchman for a local gangster, Naaga, falls in love with Vidhya, the daughter of a factory owner. He has to choose between supporting her father and his boss, who are rivals.

programme.title: Maragatha Naanayam
programme.desc: A young man races to find a legendary treasure which causes him many troubles.

programme.title: Lockup
programme.desc: Ilavarasi, a police inspector, sets out to investigate the murder of a fellow colleague. However, the evidence appears to be fabricated and suggests involvement of someone from her own department

programme.title: Chennai Palani Mars
programme.desc: An aspiring scientist and a musician, who are cocaine-addicts, attempt to travel to Mars with the help of a scientifically unstable concept.

programme.title: Aghavan
programme.desc: A police officer works undercover in Brihadeeswarar Temple in Thanjavur to protect its treasure from criminals who plan to loot the temple.

programme.title: Naalu Anju Aaru
programme.desc: A man got confused by a supernatural appearance of a woman.

programme.title: Idhu Ennoda Jilla
programme.desc: Veera loses his father in a village fight arising out of a long-standing rivalry. Can he avenge his father's death and put an end to the violence?

programme.title: Mannar Vageyra
programme.desc: Madhi helps his brother Arivu unite with the love of his life, which causes trouble between the families. When Madhi tells his parents about the woman he loves, they disapprove of his relationship.

programme.title: Kanaa
programme.desc: A woman who hails from a middle-class family background aims to excel in the competitive world of cricket with the help of her supportive father.

programme.title: India Pakistan
programme.desc: Two aspiring lawyers, Karthick and Mellina, not knowing that both are of the same profession, share an office due to financial problems. Things take a turn when they work on the same case.

programme.title: Kamali From Nadukaveri
programme.desc: Kamali From Nadukkaveri embraces the Power and the Importance of Education for Women. Born as a Girl Child in a village called Nadukkaveri, How Kamali becomes the identity of the same village is what this film is all about.

programme.title: Kuttrame Thandanai
programme.desc: A young man with a visual impairment uses his other heightened senses to unravel a murder mystery.

programme.title: Ainthu Ainthu Ainthu
programme.desc: Aravind unexpectedly loses his beloved girlfriend in a car accident. The strangest thing happens after the accident when people around him tell him no such person ever existed.

programme.title: Yaman
programme.desc: After losing his father to a bunch of scheming politicians, a young man decides to wade into the corrupt and unscrupulous world of politics to avenge his death.

programme.title: Samar
programme.desc: Shankar and Roopa fall in love with each other but she suddenly ends their relationship and moves out of the country. Shankar receives a mysterious invitation from Roopa to come to Bangkok.

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: An unemployed Rajini Murugan falls in love with Karthika, but her father opposes their union due to an old misunderstanding. Things get better after Rajini inherits his grandfather's property.

programme.title: Streetfighter
programme.desc: Zee Tamil Movie

programme.title: Market Raja Mbbs (3 Hrs)
programme.desc: An arrogant don is possessed by the ghost of a medical college student and turns meek. Now his accomplices expect the return of the actual don.

programme.desc: See Metallica in a unique performance at the Microsoft Theatre in Los Angeles benefiting their All Within My Hands Foundation.

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children.

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: Giuseppe is a priest who’s replacing the bishop of a small town near Naples. He is given the dangerous task of prohibiting the illegal dumping of industrial waste by the mafia. But his spiritual faith is tested as the dangers of his task start mounting.

programme.title: Dolce Fine Giornata
programme.desc: In Tuscany, Polish Nobel Prize winner Maria's stable family life begins to erode as her relationship with a young immigrant develops against a backdrop of terrorism and eroding democracy.

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: Four couples experience the ups and downs of pregnancy. In an IVF clinic, there’s been a mix-up between 2 couples while the owners realise they’re going to be parents again in their 40s. Meanwhile, Liane wants a baby but her partner is commitment-phobic.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: In this black comedy, a sanatorium isolated in the mountains becomes a microcosm of Kyrgyzstan; its residents comprise of a tourist, a TV host, a pervert, Chinese businessmen and drugged-up youths. Excised in linear time, reality dissolves into fantasy.

programme.title: Melissa
programme.desc: A thriller film about a domestically abused 9-year-old girl, Melissa, forming a bond with her captor after being kidnapped.

programme.title: Kuma
programme.desc: After being tricked into becoming the second wife of a Turkish man in Vienna, the naïve Ayse accepts her fate and even develops a close friendship with Fatma, the first wife. With Fatma dying of cancer, Ayse has to take over her marital duties.

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: Domingo
programme.desc: The historic election of Brazilian president Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva is seen from the perspective of a provincial bourgeois family. His inauguration deeply troubles the family, as they worry about their authority and wealth in this new administration.

programme.title: Take It Or Leave It
programme.desc: 30-year-old construction worker Erik suddenly finds himself a single parent when his ex-girlfriend, whom he hasn’t seen for six months, has a baby girl and informs him that she’ll put the child up for adoption unless he wants to take care of his daughter.

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: Giuseppe is a priest who’s replacing the bishop of a small town near Naples. He is given the dangerous task of prohibiting the illegal dumping of industrial waste by the mafia. But his spiritual faith is tested as the dangers of his task start mounting.

programme.title: Her Job
programme.desc: In this slow-burning film about sexism and female emancipation, Panayiota is an illiterate housewife who gets her first job as a cleaner. Over time, she rises up the ranks and gains her family respect; but danger looms as a series of layoffs start.

programme.title: Domingo
programme.desc: The historic election of Brazilian president Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva is seen from the perspective of a provincial bourgeois family. His inauguration deeply troubles the family, as they worry about their authority and wealth in this new administration.

programme.title: In The Heart Of The World
programme.desc: In a poor Brazilian neighbourhood, its many inhabitants struggle to make ends meet. Everyone yearns for a happier future where life isn’t only about unforgiving survival – petty crime, big crime, anything that pays becomes a pathway of hope.

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate

programme.title: Take It Or Leave It

programme.title: H Is For Happiness
programme.desc: In this quirky coming-of-age dramedy, Candice is a twelve year old girl with boundless optimism and happiness. Set in the quirky town of Albany, she sets out to conquer the trials of adolescence and bring love back into her broken family.

programme.title: Brado
programme.desc: An estranged father-son duo find themselves reunited when the father needs help running the family ranch after an injury. As they train a rebellious horse for a cross-country race, the pair learns to rebuild their relationship and heal from their pain.

programme.title: Copy Cat
programme.desc: A rookie and veteran detective work together on the case of a murdered young journalist. They quickly arrest a prime suspect who seems all but surely the killer. Yet, the ease of everything unsettles them – something isn’t right but what exactly?

programme.title: Hacker
programme.desc: Benjamin is a 13-year-old orphan and hacking enthusiast. One day, he discovers that, contrary to what he was told, his mother didn’t die in an accident years ago. In his conquest to locate her, he provokes the ire of the Danish Secret Service.

programme.title: Brado

programme.title: Super Kipli
programme.desc: Zilkifli needs to pay for the security deposit for a job he so desperately needs. To do so, he borrows a car to open a passenger shuttle route. However, he faces many setbacks and complications in his effort to do so.

programme.title: Hacker

On their journey through Mexico they meet Chauk, a Tzotzil indian who does not speak Spanish and has no official documents. They believe they will find a better world beyond the USA-Mexico border but they run into a harsh reality.

programme.desc: Oscar winners Morgan Freeman, Michael Caine and Alan Arkin team up as lifelong buddies Willie, Joe and Al, who decide to buck retirement and step off the straight-and-narrow for the first time in their lives when their pension fund becomes a corporate casualty, in director Zach Braff's comedy Going In Style. Desperate to pay the bills and come through for their loved ones, the three risk it all by embarking on a daring bid to knock off the very bank that absconded with their money.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 7
programme.desc: Brandon and Jesse lock horns in a do or die bidding war. One of them spies an authentic treasure hidden amongst the contents, but only one will walk away with the score. And later, a newbie steals a prize unit out from under our regulars and proves that she's here to play. Then, Brandon and Lori unearth a five-alarm find. If it works, they could be looking at a $20,000 pay day on this item alone.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 8
programme.desc: Our buyers bid big to win a locker packed with what looks like rare art, but will the winner walk away with cash or counterfeits? Then, a dumpy unit sends almost everyone running, but Papa Bear spies a profit. And later, the day's final auction contains expensive looking sky-diving equipment that ignites a sky-high bidding war. But when the dust settles, the winner will unveil a hidden gem that spells a five-figure payday.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 9
programme.desc: Our buyers go head-to-head to score an item that appears to be a covered car. But when the tarp is pulled back, will the winner drive away with a pile of cash or a piece of trash? Then, the legality of a locker's contents is called into question, but Brandon and Lori take a leap of faith and are rattled by what they find. And later, Sean has saved the best for last as our buyers are given the rare opportunity to compete for unclaimed airline luggage. It's an auction of a different breed that ignites a cash spending frenzy.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 10
programme.desc: A covered car lures our buyers to bid big, but the reveal could be more than the winner bargained for. Then, as the temperature climbs to the hottest day of the year, Jesse loses out to Dan on a locker full of expensive tools. But just when it lookslike Jesse is out of the race, he comes back with his biggest score yet. And later, tempers swelter as the final auction of the day pits all of our buyers in a bidding war so intense, one of them cracks under the pressure.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 2
programme.desc: The biggest auction you've ever seen explodes when rival bidders bet huge sums of money on forfeited international shipping containers. Will the bidders go home with brand new motor vehicles and large carnival antiques, or will they lose tens of thousands of dollars on duds? Each container is a mystery just waiting to be unveiled.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 3
programme.desc: Things get testy when maniac Matt goes toe-to-tow with the Israelis on a container full of high end hunting equipment, and the bidding boils over when Jason tries to one-up them on a promising container from Japan.

programme.title: The Mentalist S7 06
programme.desc: The FBI is asked to consult on a botched DEA raid, but Abbott's former colleague could derail the investigation...and Abbott's career.

programme.title: The Mentalist S7 07
programme.desc: A murder investigation becomes personal for Lisbon when she learns that her underachieving younger brother, Jimmy (ROB BELUSHI), is being sought as a key witness.

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: What was Mark Whitacre thinking? A rising star at agri-industry giant Archer Daniels Midland (ADM), Whitacre suddenly turns whistleblower. Even as he exposes his company's multi-national price-fixing conspiracy to the FBI, Whitacre envisions himself being hailed as a hero of the common man and handed a promotion. But before all that can happen, the FBI needs evidence, so Whitacre eagerly agrees to wear a wire and carry a hidden tape recorder in his briefcase, imagining himself as a kind of de facto secret agent. Unfortunately for the FBI, their lead witness hasn't been quite so forthcoming about helping himself to the corporate coffers. Whitacre's ever-changing account frustrates the agents and threatens the case against ADM as it becomes almost impossible to decipher what is real and what is the product of Whitacre's rambling imagination. Based on the true story of the highest-ranking corporate whistleblower in U.S. history.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep185
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.desc: If Memory Serves - Spock and Burnham head to Talos IV, where the process of healing Spock forces the siblings to confront their troubled past. Stamets desperately tries to reconnect with an increasingly disconnected Hugh.

programme.desc: Shangri La - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. programme.desc: The Golden Age - In Twin Dragon Alley, in the city of Kaifeng, locals tell Michael him the legend of the baby boys who became emperors. He looks at China's most famous work of art - the Kaifeng scroll.

programme.title: Wild Thailand S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Central Heartland - Life in Thailand is changing fast, resulting in people and animals having to find new ways to get along together.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Ming - Michael Wood recounts the tale of one of China's most famous dynasties beginning with the amazing story of Hongwu, a peasant rebel who founded one of greatest eras in Chinese history.

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Shangri La - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.title: Wild Japan S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hokkaido - The northern island of Hokkaido swings from Siberia-like winters to Mediterranean-like summers. Everything living on Japan's wildest island needs to be extra resilient to survive.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Golden Age - In Twin Dragon Alley, in the city of Kaifeng, locals tell Michael him the legend of the baby boys who became emperors. He looks at China's most famous work of art - the Kaifeng scroll.

programme.title: Animal Einsteins S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Builders - Chris reveals some of the best building animals in the world - an incredibly varied group.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Discover how engineers bent two Manhattan skyscrapers and then connected them with a sky bridge 700 feet in the air, and in Greece the 10,000 square foot canopy designed to withstand hurricane winds on a building engineered to survive earthquakes.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Jungle Nightmare - A violent attack happened to a tribesman in the Bolivian jungle. Cyril's on a mission to find out what kind of monster fish could be the culprit of such a violent attack.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Alexander visits the awesome Gyeonbokgung Palace, picks something up at the vast Yangnyeongsi herbal market, and even takes a look at the lucrative culture of fortune-telling, before taking lessons in drumming.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Kangaroo Island Ep2
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It’s an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 - Snake Prison Island Ep1
programme.desc: Gorgona was once home to Colombia’s Alcatraz. Modelled on Nazi concentration camps, prisoners dreamt of escape. See the island’s stunning wildlife through the eyes of a convict on the run, the monkeys, snakes and sloths who’ve now reclaimed the land.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Lights Camera Crackridge / Karaoke Dokey - Archibald scores a job as a movie star's stunt double. Loy starts to lose it after getting a disappointing score on Archibald's karaoke video game.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep10
programme.desc: Night Of The Living Croods/Spoonful Of Soo-Gar - When The Croods experience the first-ever sugar-rush, they're hooked on the delicious new food; Grug is labeled a zombie after taking the first nap.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Lucky And The Super Amazing And Fun Cousin Julian - Luckys buttons are pushed when her seemingly perfect cousin Julian comes to visit but reveals himself to be a junior con man

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever Ep9
programme.desc: Wary Lotta & The Chamber Of Secrets / Vhmess - Lotta spills a secret and worries the kids of Harvey Street won’t like her if they hear it! The girls discover a broken VHS tape which inspires them to film their own ending.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep9
programme.desc: Turbo Drift - The snails and Tito travel to Tokyo to film a commercial and Turbo is challenged to a drift race against a beautiful and mysterious female cricket.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Home Alone - Aggro, Burple and Cutter are left alone in the roost to care for some dragon eggs, but a trio of tricky Slinkwings want those eggs for themselves.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Lights Camera Crackridge / Karaoke Dokey - Archibald scores a job as a movie star's stunt double. Loy starts to lose it after getting a disappointing score on Archibald's karaoke video game.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep9
programme.desc: Struck Through The Heart / Boov Up And Drive - Oh has an electric spark when he and Tip do the ultimate best friend handshake./Tip can't get Slushious back until she passes a Boovian Driver's Test.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep9
programme.desc: The Really Really Big Lie - When Julien concocts an elaborate lie, blaming a giant "mega-gecko" for ruining a young lemur's birthday party.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep9
programme.desc: The Strength Of Scotland - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard head to Scotland, where Odlulu is using the Strength Key to give her an advantage in the Highland Games. Wenda competes in the games alongside other Wanderers while Wally and Whitebeard try to get the key from an elusive Fritz!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep9
programme.desc: Big Poppy / Neighbor War - When a troll starts to ruin the fun of open mic night Poppy is forced to enter a compliment battle.Branch tries to drive Sky Toronto away when he moves next door.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Egg Nag/Game On - The Mighty Ones accidentally knock a bird's Egg out of its nest and must take turns trying to incubate the incredibly annoying Egg until it hatches. / The Mighty Ones move into a board game in the yard that they believe to be a "city," and it's all fun and games until Berry's capitalist greed gets the best of her.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Strange Strife Of The Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep9
programme.desc: Boots - Jack Sprat steals enchanted boots from the Treasure House and triggers a dangerous Devil Wind that threatens to consume San Lorenzo's treasure.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep9
programme.desc: The Dark Side Of The Moose: Chapter Four - Bullwinkle reunites Cloyd with his parents who then take him to outer space to stop Fearless Leader and rescue Rocky

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep9
programme.desc: Quake, Rattle And Roll - Fishlegs and Meatlug liberate the Gronckles from a menacing dragon that has encroached on their ancestral home, Dark Deep.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep9
programme.desc: Return To The Balmera - The Paladins attempt to liberate the inhabitants of the Balmera, but the arrival of a Galra battle cruiser puts the mission at risk.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep9
programme.desc: The Strength Of Scotland - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard head to Scotland, where Odlulu is using the Strength Key to give her an advantage in the Highland Games. Wenda competes in the games alongside other Wanderers while Wally and Whitebeard try to get the key from an elusive Fritz!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep41
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Players - It's time for the Toyland football match but the game can't go ahead until Noddy finds the missing players. Noddy discovers that someone misdirected Pat Pat and Deltoid so that they'd miss the match. Noddy finds the missing players and reunites everyone at the real football pitch but then Hoof disappears. Noddy discovers that Hoof misdirected the others because he wanted to be the best player. Hoof learns that football is a team sport where all the team members need to work together to make it the best game ever. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep42
programme.desc: The Case Of The Changed Basketball Hoop - Noddy's about to play a game of basketball with Big Ears and Deltoid when he realizes that the hoop has been fiddled with. Who could've done that and why? Noddy's investigation leads him to Fuse, who explains that he just wanted to help the toys that weren't as skilled as him. Everyone practises and realises that the best way to improve at sport is to keep practising. Well done Noddy.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep43
programme.desc: The Case Of The Ruined Crops - Farmer Tom is confused and upset when he finds all his trees and corn knocked over. Noddy decides to investigate: who spoiled Farmer Tom's crops? He soon discovers lots of strange heavy bags scattered all over the farm. Whose are they? Where did they come from? And what could they possibly have to do with Smartysaurus's new hot air balloon?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep44
programme.desc: The Case Of The Broken Pulley - The Head Builder isn't happy. Someone's been playing with the builders' stuff and now their pulley doesn't work. Noddy decides he needs to find out who did it before anything else goes wrong. Who broke the Builders' pulley?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep41
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Noisy Challenge - Crocky challenges Raa Raa to make a noise with everything in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Will Raa Raa succeed?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep42
programme.desc: Catch The Page - Topsy is trying to read, but Raa Raa and the other jungle animals are all racing around making too much noise. Topsy is so upset she accidentally rips the last page from her book… can her friends set off on a noisy chase through the jungle to find it?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep43
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Squeaky - Raa Raa is in a particularly helpful mood and offers to help everyone take provisions for the picnic to Rockywockyville for them. But he doesn't arrive in time, everyone sets out to see what has happened to their noisy little lion friend

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep44
programme.desc: Wake Up Huffty - The animals are all looking forward to waking up early to watch the dawn chorus, but Huffty doesn't stir when the alarm goes off. Can Raa Raa and the others wake the sleeping elephant in time?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep41
programme.desc: Roary'S Demolition Derby - Roary is in a mischievous mood and keeps crashing into things. Big Chris has a great idea how Roary can burn up all his energy and be helpful at the same time!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep42
programme.desc: Manners Please - Farmer Green and FB are very nervous about going to Mama Mia's garden party. James and the other cars offer to teach them how to behave at such an event. But everything doesn't quite go to plan…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep43
programme.desc: Big Chris' Big Jump - Big Chris has agreed to do a parachute jump for charity but loses his nerve on the big day. Can Roary talk him through it, just like Big Chris did for him when he got scared?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep44
programme.desc: Brassless Bandfinal - The brass band booked for the Silver Hatch parade have cancelled. Mr Carburettor will be furious if he doesn't have music at his parade. Roary and his friends think up an ingenious plan...

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep21
programme.desc: Power Outage Part 3 + 4 - Power Outage – Part 3: Escape from Scare School Things worsen when a leprechaun, Razznik, steals the magical cleptor that now holds all of Scare School's powers. Power Outage – Part 4: The Final Battle On a hunt for ghostly powers, the evil leprechaun orders Deedstown to hand over Casper's uncles, OR ELSE.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep22
programme.desc: Ghost In The Gallery / Wart On The Nose - Ghost in the Gallery After hearing reports of a ghost stealing artwork from the Deedstown Museum, Casper becomes convinced that his uncles are involved. Wart on the Nose When Professor Thurdigree Burns comes down with dragon flu, Casper, Mantha and Ra are tasked with finding a cure.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep10
programme.desc: Ready, Set, Glow / Breakneck'S Back - In order to investigate one of Skidmark's conspiracy theories, Turbo and Skid join a dangerous underground zip line race/The crew is surprised when Whiplash enters the town's annual Tomato Games. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep10

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Clippy Claws - Pat has a very special delivery today! Micawber's claws need clipping and Pat needs to deliver not only the claw clippers but Amy the vet too! On the way to the lighthouse though they encounter all sorts of animals needing help today – from a poorly Bonnie with a cold to a fretful Pumpkin who doesn't want to take his horse pills! Meanwhile, poor Micawber's claws are so long and he's so upset by getting them tangled up in things like Chris's scarf and the lighthouse tablecloth that he flies out of the window, carrying the tangled lighthouse keys in his claws! Chris tries to get them back and finds himself locked out of the lighthouse altogether! Luckily, Pat and Amy arrive in the SDS helicopter. Pat lowers Amy down to Micawber who is perched on top of the lighthouse and she's soon able to clip his claws and retrieve the keys. Phew! Well done Amy and well done Pat!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Sorting Machine - Pat and Jess are called to Cardiff to collect a new sorting machine when the Pencaster machine breaks down. Whilst they negotiate with Rowena Roberts, the Cardiff sorting office manager, as to how to move the heavy machine onto the SDS plane, Ben is fighting his own battles at the Pencaster office as his merry band of “helpers” from the village cause more chaos in their attempts to sort the post!After a quick tour of Gilbertson Castle, Pat and Jess manage to get the new sorting machine to Pencaster just in time to deliver a missing birthday present to Meera. Happy Birthday Meera – and well done, Postman Pat!

programme.title: Olivia Ep19
programme.desc: Olivia Leads A Parade - As Mother tries to get baby William to sleep, Olivia, Ian and Julian create a backyard parade. When Francine finds out, she decides she's going to make her OWN parade. Olivia eventually sees that two parades can be better than one –and even figures out how to keep fussy William asleep.

programme.title: Olivia Ep20
programme.desc: Olivia Tends To The Sick - Julian comes down with a case of “itchyfootitis,” so it's Dr. Olivia to the rescue, with all kinds of silly treatments. When the “condition” begins to spread to others, Olivia imagines herself running an entire “itchy foot” clinic, and eventually discovers the perfect cure.

Noddy investigates: who left the big pile of cabbages there and why? And will he be able to solve the case in time for the Royal Picnic?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep46
programme.desc: The Case Of The Queen'S Special Gift - The Knights have been away travelling around Toyland and they each return with a special gift for the Queen. But the last Knight to arrive back was so busy having fun that he forgot to bring back a present for the Queen. Noddy assures him the Queen won't mind but the poor Knight is adamant he must give her something. Noddy sets out to help him find the perfect gift.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep47
programme.desc: The Case Of The Pirates' Missing Treasure - When the Pockets find an old treasure map, the Pirates are delighted. They race off to find the treasure. Only to come back rather confused. They found a treasure chest but it ran away! Noddy investigates: "What's happened to the Pirates' treasure?"

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep48
programme.desc: The Case Of The Frozen Toys - Noddy and Big Ears come to Fable Forest to see the Queen Sparklewings's magic crystal collection. But when they arrive at the Fairy Castle, they find all the toys there frozen like statues. What's going on. It's up to Noddy to investigate and help his friends return to their normal selves.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep45
programme.desc: Gone Fishing - Raa Raa is keen to try fishing with Crocky, but keeps scaring the fish away every time he makes a noise. Crocky and the others come up with a very special fishing trip for Raa Raa

The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.desc: Super-Shark / William vs. Wild - Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes. // After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Every Cloud/Rainbow Comet Rush - Bobbi wants to spend time with Jade, but there are candy floss clouds to worry about first! // Can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? Only if Jade learns to trust her friends.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Paddington Shares A Good Deed / Paddington Goes Green - Mr. Gruber does a good turn for Paddington & says he can thank him by passing it on to someone else, which is harder than it sounds! // Paddington learns all about composting thanks to Mr. Mulch, but will he grow flowers in time for Aunt Lucy?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Paddington And The Aliens - Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world? Paddington forms a greeting committee!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Campfire Stories - It's a campout under the stars! Blaze, AJ, Starla, Crusher, and Pickle are gathered around the campfire to tell the most amazing stories they can make up! And the best part? Whoever tells the best story wins the last marshmallow!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Superwheels! - Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!
