But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Blue's Storytime with Camila - We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep808
programme.desc: Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express / Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers - When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. // Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot / Yup Day - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep212
programme.desc: The Big Bug Hunt/Deer Ball - Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with. // Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave - Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Paddington And The Fundraising - The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep501
programme.desc: AJ to the Rescue - Blaze and AJ are racing through the jungle when Blaze gets trapped in super sticky mud! Now it's up to AJ and his new animal friends, to go on an epic adventure to save Blaze!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep502
programme.desc: The Trophy Chase - The Championship Race is about to start, and all the fastest trucks in town are ready to roll! But when Crusher steals the trophy before the race even begins, it's up to Blaze and his friends to get it back in time.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Tina's New Friend - While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Comet Cupcakes - The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon - Santi and crew go underwater to stop Escarlata la Pirata before she steals all the Magic Rubies from Giant Clam Reef! // It's a nighttime chase above and below the sea when Escarlata turns the moon into a fish.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Mountain Ninja Rescue - Ninjas Zooli and Oona are excited for their first mission: escorting snow monkey Moshi up Mt. Danger to join his troop! But it won't be easy: a storm looms, and mischievous Moshi is causing trouble! Will they complete their mission in time?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep616
programme.desc: The Big Rig Bandit! - When reckless hyena Spotty steals young elephant Eli from the savanna, Wildlife Rangers Zooli and Goby hop into their big rig to rescue him! But when the big rig chase lands Spotty and Eli in danger, it's up to the Guppies to save the day!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Computer - Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep155
programme.desc: Ron's Sunburn - Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep156
programme.desc: Bubu's Portrait - Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a surprise gift. As she is missing a colour, she leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher arrives and finds the abandoned painting, he decides to take it to Bubu's.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Perfect Portrait - Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Cave Barbapapas / The Little Monsters - The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Mailtime Mystery - It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who the letter is for.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Firefighters to the Rescue! - When three fire emergencies break out across Axle City, it's up to Blaze to put 'em out - and to do it, he'll transform into the most epic fire rescue vehicles we've ever seen!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Pups Save a Tour Bus / Pups Save Midnight at the Museum - Mayor Humdinger's tour bus goes out of control when he tries to bring tourists to Foggy Bottom! PAW Patrol to the rescue! // A fun museum sleepover is interrupted when Alex and the mini-patrol go missing, and Mayor Goodway gets stranded on a T-Rex!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep901
programme.desc: Liberty Meets a New Friend / Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest - Liberty mistakenly brings a bear into town, thinking it's someone's pet. She must fix her mistake and rescue Chickaletta. // Francois' hot-air balloon goes out of control before the Pup Pup Boogie Contest. The Pups, with Liberty, race to the rescue.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Over the rainbow / We're toast - The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Wheel of Steel - Some changes to the design of Kai's big Ferris wheel, that Sir Steel makes don't go quite the way he thought they would!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava - Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure - Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisõit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep616
programme.desc: The Big Rig Bandit! - When reckless hyena Spotty steals young elephant Eli from the savanna, Wildlife Rangers Zooli and Goby hop into their big rig to rescue him! But when the big rig chase lands Spotty and Eli in danger, it's up to the Guppies to save the day!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Something New at Blue's School - Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Meet Josh! - Something is missing from Blue's snack, so we play Blue's Clues with our new host, Josh, to find out what it is. With a little help from our old friends, Steve and Joe, Josh finds out what Blue wants with her snack.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Puppy Chase! - When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Tina's New Friend - While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Comet Cupcakes - The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Kiko's Song / Return to Merlandia - When the coquís of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence.// The crew return to Merlandia for an underwater fair, but must save the day when the power grid becomes overloaded.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep811
programme.desc: Pups vs. A Neon Humdinger - When Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News - The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Mr Bull in a China Shop - While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Fruit - It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Apple Picking - The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep150
programme.desc: The Talking Flower - Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep74
programme.desc: Blow - It's a windy day and the Teletubbies collect lots of leaves that have blown off the trees. The leaves go everywhere in Home Dome, so The Noo-­‐noo cleans up.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) Ep19
programme.desc: Feather - Dee encourages a friend to say `feather', and goes on a whirlwind word adventure. They see lots of different types of feathers: a grey feather, a spotty feather, a fluffy feather and a unicorn feather.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: Mega Stuck Truck - Team Tinpo's new mega-truck is so big it doesn't fit through the garage door!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: It's Time to See a Rainbow - JoJo and Gran Gran get caught in the rain at the park and shelter under the bandstand. JoJo spots a rainbow and discovers that rainbows are only visible when it's rainy and sunny at the same time.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep46
programme.desc: Piggy Blues - Monty discovers Jimmy Jones is sad and tries to cheer him up, but wonders why everyone can't be happy all the time.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep45
programme.desc: Big and Small - Monty is struggling to make a huge gift for Jimmy Jones and starts to wonder if the best things might come in small packages.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: Markets - When Bluey visits the markets with five bucks from the tooth fairy, the options are endless. But as she and Indy look for the perfect purchase, spending it proves hard.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep19
programme.desc: The Delivery Badge - Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep18
programme.desc: The Eating Badge - The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep17
programme.desc: The Dream Badge - The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep28
programme.desc: Ronda Reunion, Spain - Foz tries to play a Spanish guitar, and Xuli is delighted when her first ever souvenir selfie flutters out of it. It shows her on holiday as a child in a Spanish town with her long-lost friend Maria.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep27
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Rainbow - After a rainbow appears over the Go Jet Academy, Glitch becomes fascinated with the legend of a pot of gold appearing at the end of it.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: The Claw - When Bluey and Bingo are unable to grab a prize on a Magic Claw machine, Mum and Dad create their own version at home. But Dad isn't about to make winning easy.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep18
programme.desc: The Doctor - Honey is stuck waiting for Dr Bingo's as the other injuries get seen before her. Receptionist Bluey tells her to be patient, some of these cases are a real pickle!

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: Andy and the Pygmy Gecko - Andy jets off in his safari mobile to the rainforest of Brazil in search of a pygmy gecko.

programme.title: My Pet and Me (S3) Ep9
programme.desc: Ginger the Millipede - This series helps children appreciate what it really means to have a pet. Rory visits Sophie and her pet millipede, Ginger. They find out the sort of things a millipede eats.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S4) Ep7
programme.desc: Seadog Supper - Captain Captain arrives feeling very excited, one of her old seadog friends is coming for supper and she wants Cook and Line to get everything prepared for their arrival.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep16
programme.desc: The Rainbow Badge - The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep15
programme.desc: The Ambition Badge - Duggee masters his ambition of building a model of the Clubhouse out of sticks. This encourages the Squirrels to think of their own ambitions, and how they can achieve them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep14
programme.desc: The Accessory Badge - The Squirrels see Duggee accessorising his tie and want to learn how to do it themselves. All of the Squirrels accessorise an item and showcase their goods.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep26
programme.desc: Climate Change, The Arctic Ocean - The Go Jetters are watching for polar bears, but an iceberg is heading for their ship!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep25
programme.desc: Holi Festival of Colour, India - Glitch takes all of the colourful powder from the Festival of Colour in Dwarka, India. Can the Go Jetters get it back?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S14) Ep11
programme.desc: Thomas in Charge - The Island inspector pays a visit to Sodor; when Thomas attempts to impress him, his plans lead to chaos.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep9
programme.desc: Twang Ball - Scarf Lady introduces Sarah and Duck to a new game involving knitted sporting equipment.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: Alarm Cluck - Duck keeps oversleeping, so Sarah decides he needs his own alarm clock.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Blown Together - It's a very windy day and Nelly and Nora have to work together to get home.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: Dog Loves Treasure - Dog and Pug arrive on a desert island and find a pirate who has lost his treasure.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep44
programme.desc: The Good Winner - Jeanie gets mad when she doesn't win a game, leaving Monty wondering whether you can turn a sore loser into a good loser.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep38
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Wondermost - The Dinopaws want to do something special at the beach, but making a decision becomes hard!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep15
programme.desc: Let's Go Buy a Kite - It's hard to get to the kite shop when there's a gale blowing down the street. But don't worry: Team Tinpo are here with a radical solution!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: Mega Stuck Truck - Team Tinpo's new mega-truck is so big it doesn't fit through the garage door!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: Calypso - At school, Bluey and her friends enjoy various games. Teacher Calypso keeps her charges on track with a wise word and a song... all except the mysterious Pretzel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep13
programme.desc: The Mountain Badge - The Squirrels need to rescue Enid when they see her at the top of the Mighty Sugar Bun Mountain.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep12
programme.desc: The Lost Property Badge - The Squirrels lose Tag in the Clubhouse but to find him they're going to have to figure out where the Lost Property room is.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep11
programme.desc: The Pet Badge - The Squirrels meet a scruffelump in the woods, and despite Duggee's reservations, take him in. But they soon learn the responsibilities of taking care of a pet.

programme.desc: Chinese New Year, Dragon Dance Drama - Kyan's invited to perform a dragon dance for Chinese New Year in Beijing. Glitch decides to build a fire breathing dragon robot for the parade and The Go Jetters need to stop it!

programme.desc: Numpups Can't Fly - Little Sandy decides she wants to fly just like Super Numtum.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep23
programme.desc: A few months ago, Sri Lankan protestors had a moment of triumph, storming the presidential palace and occupying its grounds. Now a new president is cracking down, putting many in jail. We ask, will the movement surrender?

programme.title: Next Gen Agriculture Ep1
programme.desc: Twenty years ago rural leaders were alarmed by young people's perceived declining interest in rural jobs and lives. But as this episode of Landline's Next Gen Agriculture series shows, it's a different story now.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep10

programme.title: The Business: Summer Series Ep3
programme.desc: In this Summer Special of The Business, the team delves into the energy crisis that developed in 2022, including the reasons behind it. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.desc: Live coverage of the Sydney to Hobart Yacht Race start from Sydney Harbour, with days of world class racing down the south coast of NSW and across the Tasman Sea to Hobart.

programme.title: The Context with John Barron Ep6
programme.desc: Are we a nation of gamblers? John Barron speaks with Australia's top experts on poker machines, gambling and addiction. Plus are we seeing the return of the Cold War or something potentially more deadly?

programme.title: Language and Me
programme.desc: A look at the role language plays for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people, highlighting the work done by language custodians to preserve this important aspect of our cultural and social lives. Hosted by Jack Evans.

programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 8 - Heather Ewart travels to Leonora in the goldfields of WA. 800km north-east of Perth, its home to Australia's richest road mile running race and where heptathlete-turned-bobsleigh Winter Olympian Kiara Reddingius was raised.

programme.title: Surviving Extinction
programme.desc: Australia has some of the most unique animals anywhere on the planet and also one of the highest rates of threatened species. We look at efforts to save five unique Australian species that are on the verge of extinction.

programme.title: ABC News Ep4

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Kate Ceberano exudes boundless energy and a big personality, and she's had a much more complicated family life than many realise. So how will Anh capture all this on canvas?

programme.title: ABC News Ep2
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the latest news and the day's top stories, with reporters on the ground to tell you what's happening and why it matters.

programme.title: Australia's Remote Islands Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Lord Howe Island, off the East coast of Australia is a speck in the middle of the Tasman Sea. Home to only 350 people; the World's Most Southern Coral Reef; and the Kentia Palm, the locals call it paradise.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep4
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the day's top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of what's happening as it unfolds.

programme.title: Back To Nature Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Hosts Aaron Pedersen and Holly Ringland explore the art of creation as they travel on and around Dyarubbin, the Hawkesbury River. They find rock art, meet with writer Georgina Reid, and artist and Gomeroi man, Gavi Duncan.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep4

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Trevor and wife Jeanette are looking to build a very special home close to nature in which Trevor can move about easily in his wheelchair.

programme.title: Muster Dogs Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - It's spills and thrills as the puppies and trainers stumble and at times leap through the milestone challenges. Frank and CJ are going well but Joni, Aticia and Rob are off to a bumpy start.

programme.title: Dream Gardens Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - After renovating their converted factory home with a nod to its warehouse heritage, a Sydney couple crave their own green space. But how do you balance a lush garden with an edgy, industrial home?

programme.title: Escape From The City Ep43
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Globetrotters Mark and Kate are returning to Australian shores and are looking for a country property in the Fleurieu region of South Australia that has enough space for them to own plenty of animals.

programme.title: Things That Made Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Refrigeration profoundly changed the world, but few know it is an Australian invention dating back to the 1850's. Tim Lee explores the history of Geelong inventor, James Harrison.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep4
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the day's top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of what's happening as it unfolds.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep33
programme.desc: In towns and cities across Australia, the critical lack of affordable and social housing now means people with low paying jobs are struggling to find accommodation. Louise Milligan reports on the new face of homelessness.
